segments.title: Pattern & Architectures
segments.description: Focuses on architecture patterns and standards to design, build, and integrate robust AI systems and agents.

segments.title: Frameworks
segments.description: Focuses on Frameworks used in AI application development.

segments.title: Data, Feature Extraction & Storage
segments.description: Covers the aspects of data collection, preparation, feature extraction and theire storage and handling.

segments.title: Models & Platforms
segments.description: Covers model discovery and selection of models. As well as common platforms and fools that run models for you.

segments.title: Evaluation & Observability
segments.description: Covers tools and platforms for evaluating, testing, and optimizing AI models, including deployment frameworks for managing model lifecycles in production.

segments.title: Other Tools
segments.description: Includes utilities and tools that do not fit into one category. For example overarching lowcode or AI Workflow tools.

labels.title: AI Technology Radar
labels.subtitle: The Radar around the Development of professional AI Agents, RAG Systems and LLMOps.
labels.footer: The AI radar is a project by AOE GmbH. Feel free to build your own radar based on the open source project.
labels.notUpdated: This item was not updated in last three versions of the Radar. Should it have appeared in one of the more recent editions, there is a good chance it remains pertinent. However, if the item dates back further, its relevance may have diminished and our current evaluation could vary. Regrettably, our capacity to consistently revisit items from past Radar editions is limited.
labels.pageAbout: How to use AOE AI Technology Radar?
